database.name: VIEW ESCM_MATERIAL_REQLN_V
database.view: SELECT escm_material_reqln.escm_material_reqln_id AS escm_material_reqln_v_id, escm_material_reqln.ad_client_id, escm_material_reqln.ad_org_id, escm_material_reqln.isactive, escm_material_reqln.created, escm_material_reqln.createdby, escm_material_reqln.updated, escm_material_reqln.updatedby, escm_material_reqln.line, escm_material_reqln.escm_material_request_id, COALESCE(escm_material_reqln.generic_product, escm_material_reqln.m_product_id) AS m_product_id, escm_material_reqln.description, escm_material_reqln.c_uom_id, escm_material_reqln.requested_qty, escm_material_reqln.need_by_date, escm_material_reqln.notes, escm_material_reqln.item_type, escm_material_reqln.conditions, escm_material_reqln.unitprice, escm_material_reqln.delivered_qty, escm_material_reqln.failure_reason, escm_material_reqln.ad_image_id, escm_material_reqln.escm_initialreceipt_id, escm_material_reqln.escm_returnaddlines, escm_material_reqln.pending_qty, escm_material_reqln.m_warehouse_id, escm_material_reqln.multiissueqty, escm_material_reqln.isgeneric, escm_material_reqln.generic_product FROM escm_material_reqln WHERE escm_material_reqln.iscopy = 'N'
